title: High-Dose Intravenous Vitamin C Therapy - IV Boost UK
description: High-Dose Intravenous Vitamin C Therapy. Get Vitamin C IV therapy. Vitamin C drips conveniently available at our London Clinic (Harley Street Area)
cleaned_text: You get a consultation from a highly experienced IV Doctor On the day of your appointment you will be seen by one of our highly trained IV specialist Doctors or IV Boost founder, Dr Joshua Berkowitz himself. We will have a medical consultation with you to learn your personal needs and confirm the most suitable IV treatment options for you.
